author: Aaron Weaver
title: Hey Madonna, the Coronavirus Doesn’t Care About Your Video – Neither Do We
description: Madonna released a cringe-worthy bathtub video where she called coronavirus "the great equalizer." Unfortunately for Madonna and her message, she's still a billionaire. And we are not. The post Hey Madonna, the Coronavirus Doesn’t Care About Your Video – Neit…
content:
• Madonna posted a laughable ominous video calling coronavirus the great equalizer.
  • The only thing equal about Madonna and the rest of the world is that we can all make terrible videos.
  • Lets hope this is her last fame-grab for a while.
